lore: Many Canonesses go to battle equiped with jump packs, using them to descend from the heavens and mete aut the Emperor's justice. Their Orders, combining strategic expertise with martial prowess. They lead flights of airborne warriors into the raging hearth of the battle.

otherAbilities.name: Rites of Battle:
otherAbilities.description: Once per battleÂ round , one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem . If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

otherAbilities.name: Divine Deliverance:
otherAbilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase , this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and those weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

wargear.description: This model"s blessed halberd can be replaced with one of the following
items: Ministorum hand flamer and 1 power weapon
